metadata.name: La vita è bella #1
metadata.description:
La vita è bella means life is beautiful. The NFTs represent ancient Mediterranean paintings in modernized digital form. A combination of nostalgic Roman architecture and breathtaking landscapes.


With the NFTs, I try to let the viewer feel my longing and love for the Mediterranean region. The viewer should feel the emotions that this landscape creates in reality in this picture. The incredible atmosphere is created by certain colors, light influences and perspective.

The NFT has already been converted to PNG format and is in portrait format (3:4) in 5333 x 8000px. With the help of artificial intelligence I try to achieve perfection.

I wish you good health, love and success in your life. I hope that you enjoy this NFT and that you feel the atmosphere.
